name: Audit Report
excerpt: This timeline shows all the security audits that were performed by OZ team

events.title: Open Zeppelin Security Research Audit
events.summary:
## Audit 4.9.0 changes. 

| Issue Type                    | Issues Found                                    |
|------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------|
| Total Issues                  | 26 (18 resolved, 1 partially resolved)         |
| Critical Severity            | 0                                               |
| High Severity               | 0                                              |
| Medium Severity              | 3 (2 resolved)                                  |
| Low Severity                 | 3 (3 resolved)                                  |
| Notes & Additional Info      | 20 (13 resolved, 1 partially resolved)         |
events.fullDetails:
